channel.title: Schedule on Core Interaction Spring 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Schedule on Core Interaction Spring 2022

item.title: Week 1
item.description: WEEK 1 (REMOTE) Tue 1/25 Studio IN CLASS Introductions (Sophie and Eric) Fill out the Questionnaire Group Agreement Review Syllabus Intro: Reading assignments sign up Begin Unit 1: Intx with the Internet Exercise: Slack Avatar AFTER CLASS READ + WATCH Cyberspace Origins (lecture) & Internet Today (lecture) on vimeo, check Slack for the password Olia Lialina (reading) Everyone writes a discussion comment or question here. Reading leaders, please connect the readings to the two lectures and prepare comments and questions around this.

item.title: Week 10
item.description: WEEK 10 Tue 4/5 Studio In Class Reading discussion, Haylee is our discussion leader Review Project 3 Part 6 After Class Project 3, Part 7 Reminder: CD Lecture Responses Thu 4/7 Studio In Class Small group reviews (Part 7) Today’s notes Activity: Documenting your partner’s work After Class Project 3, Part 8 Complete the in class activity: Documenting Your Partners Work, for Tuesday (1 week from now) Fri 4/8 Lab In Class Crit for Farewell, World

item.title: Week 11
item.description: WEEK 11 Tue 4/12 Studio In Class Today’s notes Small group meetings Ambient work time (Part 9) After Class Complete Documenting your partner’s work activity (at the bottom of the page). Project 3, Part 9 Thu 4/14 Studio In Class Review Exercise: Filters (from a few weeks ago) Review Stories as Networks partner documentation activity Optional 1:1s (Part 10) After Class Project 3, Part 10 Fri 4/15 Lab In Class Ambient Software, SLIDES, RECORDING

item.title: Week 12
item.description: WEEK 12 Tue 4/19 Studio In Class Unit 4: Interaction with People Begins Project 4: Input/Output introduction Today’s notes Exercise: Favicon After Class Complete your Elastic Collections project for Thursday. It should be online at the start of class. Please be on time! WATCH Accessibility Lecture Thu 4/21 Studio In Class Project 3 Critique After Class Project 4, Part 1. READ Glitching the Master’s House and add a discussion comment/question here.

item.title: Week 13
item.description: WEEK 13 Tue 4/26 Studio In Class Hearing from Shiyao and Gayoung on Run Your Own Social Hearing from Hugo and Hallie on Glitching the Master’s House Today’s Notes (class activity) Ambient work time + quick meetings After Class Watch Human Centered Design Lecture Project 4, Part 2 Thu 4/28 Studio In Class After Class Read Exclusive Design and write one discussion question/comment [here].

item.title: Week 14
item.description: WEEK 14 Tue 5/3 Studio (REMOTE) In Class After Class Thu 5/5 Studio (REMOTE) In Class After Class Fri 5/6 Lab In Class After Class

item.title: Week 15
item.description: WEEK 15 Tue 5/10 Studio (REMOTE) In Class After Class Thu 5/12 Studio (REMOTE) In Class After Class Fri 5/13 Lab In Class After Class

item.title: Week 2
item.description: WEEK 2 (REMOTE) Tue 2/1 Studio In Class Discuss lectures + readings. Hannah is our discussion leader. Today’s Notes Small group meetings to discuss project ideas in groups of 3-4 ambient work time (Exercise: Screen Time) After Class P1: Part 2 Finish Exercise: Screen Time Thu 2/3 Studio In Class Small group crits: Implementation Today’s Notes Organizing Files for the Web File Structure Demo After Class P1: Part 4 Read Amanda Hess, Slack Off: How workplace chat is changing office culture & add write your comments/questions in the Unit 1 Reading document.

item.title: Week 3
item.description: WEEK 3 Tue 2/8 Studio In Class Discuss lectures + readings (Sophie is our discussion leader) P1: Final crit with Sophie & Eric Review What’s the point of critique Last person who presented is first to speak about next presenter’s work After Class READ Loretta Staples American Artist Frank Chimero WATCH Digital Typography and Language in User Interfaces Bias within Design Systems Write your comments/questions in the Unit 2 Reading document

item.title: Week 4
item.description: WEEK 4 Tue 2/15 Studio In Class Today’s notes Small group critique: review ideas Exercise: HANDMADE CODE Ambient work time: P2: Part 2 After Class Complete P2: Part 2 Make sure your Github is linked to the class website and that all your links are working. Thu 2/17 Studio In Class Lectures: Responsive Web + Typography on the Web (access with newschool email) Today’s notes Review P2: Part 2 + references After Class P2: Part 3 Fri 2/18 Lab In Class Lecture

item.title: Week 5
item.description: WEEK 5 Tue 2/22 Studio In Class Today’s Notes Exercise: Typographic Explorations Small Group reviews + ambient work time After Class P2: Part 4 Thu 2/24 Studio In Class Today’s Notes Exercise: Hover States Ambient Work time + optional 1:1s After Class P2: Part 5 Complete Exercise: Hover States and add to your Github Fri 2/25 Lab In Class LECTURE

item.title: Week 6
item.description: WEEK 6 Tue 3/1 Studio In Class Today’s Notes Part 5 pair reviews + 1:2s check-ins After Class P2, Part 6 Check out this event (today, 6:30pm) And this podcast (maybe listen while coding…) Thu 3/3 Studio In Class Today’s Notes Part 6 reviews + Small Group check-ins After Class Project 2, Part 7 (complete project) Fri 3/4 Lab In Class TECHNICAL

item.title: Week 7
item.description: WEEK 7 Tue 3/8 Studio In Class Today’s Notes Critique: Stories as Networks After Class Review Stories as Networks projects and identify a couple that stood out to you. Watch Dynamic Use of Data Read Sharing as Survival: Mindy Seu on the Cyberfeminism Index and write one discussion comment/question. Themis will be our discussion leader. Thu 3/10 Studio In Class Mid-semester survey Reading discussion: Hear from Themis about Sharing as Survival and Dynamic Use of Data.

item.title: Week 8
item.description: WEEK 8 Tue 3/22 Studio In Class Hear from Gianna and discuss Data Feminism Review Exercise: Flexbox Calendar Discuss project ideas in small groups Exercise: Things that go beep Project 3: Part 2 After Class Watch Documenting your Work (video lecure) Read The Hidden Life of an Amazon User (Haylee is our discussion leader) and write one discussion question/comment Project 3: Part 2 Thu 3/24 Studio In Class Cancelled After Class Project 3: Part 3 Fri 3/25 Lab In Class Review Assignment

item.title: Week 9
item.description: WEEK 9 Tue 3/29 Studio In Class Review collections Today’s notes Exercise: Filter P3, Part 4 + 5 After Class P3, Part 5 Thu 3/31 Studio In Class Reading Discussion (Haylee is our discussion leader) Review Exercise: Things That Go Beep Review P3, Part 5 Today’s notes Exercise: Filter After Class P3, Part 6 Finish Exercise: Filter Fri 4/1 Lab In Class Working session
